meta.title: Connections Academy | Online Public School from Home

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: Connections Academy is a K-12 education program that offers virtual learning from home. Learn more about how online public school can benefit your family.

a.title: For enrollment help, call us now at 1-800-382-6010

li.a: Is Online Schooling Right for You?
Explore a Day in the Life

div.p: Connections Academy’s tuition-free online public K-12 school partners with parents to provide students with an engaging, high-quality education in a safe learning environment. See how our schools can prepare your child for success in school and into the future

div.div: View the eGuide to see how our school works and learn more!
Start your online school enrollment now!

div.p: Connections Academy is a tuition-free full-time online public school for grades K–12, with schools located in communities across the country. At every grade level, students take core courses in math, science, language arts/English, social studies, and electives, and work from a state-approved, high-quality curriculum with support from certified teachers. The goal? To prepare your student for college and career success.
Connections Academy has connected me with the right people and opportunities to allow me to thrive as a student and help me prepare for college.
We don’t all live and learn the same way, and parents may be surprised to find that alternatives can work better and can help their family meet their goals.

div.h2: Attend an Event or Information Session
div.p: Find out how Connections Academy prepares students for the future by attending an event. You choose the event that works best for you!

The bond between teachers and families speaks for itself. In addition, Connections Academy provides opportunities for socialization in LiveLesson sessions, field trips, clubs, and more. This allows students to connect and get together offline
